name: Working days
description: The API returns the number of days,  hours, working days, working hours, wages, weekend days, and the list of public holidays of the requested date period and country. You can also add any number of working days or working hours to a given date. 50 countries and over 230 regional calendars are supported and we work hard to keep our database up to date by following government announcements regarding public holidays changes. All the calendars can be fully customized from our friendly working da...

api_methods.name: /1.3/list_non_working_days
api_methods.description: List the non working days (weekend days, public holidays and custom dates) between two dates in chronlogical order.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me all the public holidays and weekends in Germany between March 1st and March 31st, 2024?
I need a list of all non-working days in Canada from July 1, 2023, to July 15, 2023, including weekends and statutory holidays.
Please find out which days are holidays or weekends in Japan during the first two weeks of May 2024.
List all the non-working days in Brazil from December 20, 2023, to January 5, 2024, so I can plan my vacation accordingly.
Could you provide the weekends and public holidays in the UK between August 15 and August 31, 2023?
I want to know all the non-working days in Australia for the month of October 2023, including any regional holidays.
Show me the list of public holidays and weekends in South Africa from April 1 to April 15, 2024.
Find all the non-working days in India between November 1 and November 15, 2023, so I can schedule my meetings accordingly.
Can you list the weekends and public holidays in France from June 10 to June 25, 2023?
I need to know all the non-working days in the United States between September 1 and September 15, 2023, including federal holidays.

api_methods.name: /1.3/add_working_days
api_methods.description: Add (or remove) any number of working days to a date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of working days you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero)

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true. If you set include_start to false ("false" or "0"), the count will start at the next working day (or previous working day, if increment is negative)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what date it will be 15 working days after March 1, 2024, in Canada, excluding the start date?
I need to find out the date 10 working days before July 20, 2023, in Germany, including the start date.
Add 7 working days to September 5, 2024, for the UK calendar with bank holidays considered.
Please calculate the date 20 working days after January 10, 2025, in Australia, but don't count the start date.
What will be the date 5 working days after December 15, 2023, in Japan, including public holidays?
Find the date 12 working days before April 1, 2024, in France, considering federal holidays and including the start date.
Calculate the date 8 working days after August 10, 2023, in India, excluding the start date and using the regional calendar for Maharashtra.
I want to know the date 3 working days after November 25, 2024, in Brazil, including the start date and considering all public holidays.
Could you figure out the date 18 working days before May 15, 2023, in South Africa, excluding the start date?
Add 25 working days to February 1, 2024, in the United States, including federal holidays and counting the start date.
